ygData.subject: Re: FEW QUESTIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you get the words for them and either research them yourself or have a higher lvl necro do it for you.  im L15, can anyone tell me how reliable research
ygData.messageBody:
>Im in Povar, New L16 Gnome necro, and cannot locate two spells; >Banshee
>Aura and Restless Bones. Gnome guild doesn't have these. >Where can I
>find them? How best to and get them?

you get the words for them and either research them yourself or have a
higher lvl necro do it for you. im L15, can anyone tell me how reliable
research is, and some tips to getting the most out of it?

>How best to control a pet, such as in Unrest? While in the Castle >in CB
>it ran away and I lost 2 pets that way. Would not respond to >commands
>even tho alive.

i hate my pets in dungeons; groups are much more reliable. pets tend to
wander off and bring every damn mob in the dungeon back with them if they
eventually find you. if you dont see your pet, and it doesnt respond to
follow, its probably a good time to zone. also, if you see the 'taunting
attacker master' message come up, and dont know where he is, that is a sure
sign that once your pet gets killed you will have at least one mob gunning
for your little necro butt.

>I found a L16 spell not familiar with; Spirit Armor?

spirit armor is our first buff that doesnt hurt us =) you can cast it on
your pet and others. it has a +ac effect.

>And lastly, with Heat Blood, Engulf Darkness, and Heart Flutter, if >all
>stacked about how much damage done?

dont know. im not into exact numbers.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro
